插件可以做到:
(假定消息为[test])屏蔽服务器中消息[test]的显示屏蔽服务器包含[test]这串文字的消息的显示屏蔽服务器中以[test]开头的消息的显示屏蔽服务器中以[test]结尾的消息的显示

插件配置 Config.yml
# Message Blocker by MC-Resources - https://mc-resources.store
##开源  https://github.com/MC-Resources-Store/message-blocker
##翻译来自潜水E
#请把要屏蔽的信息放到message行，不需要颜色字符
#'mode'的类型:'contains'[包含],'exact'[等于],'starts_with'[以'message'开头], 
#             'ends_with'[以'message'结尾]
#如果'ignore_case'设定为true,消息的大小写将不会被检测
#'bypass_permission'填写权限，有权限的会允许接收到消息
#请注意这不仅会影响服务器,还会影响玩家消息

blocked:
  #如果消息等于[eaxact]'Message Blocker'就屏蔽(不区分大小写)
  - message: 'Message Blocker'
    mode: 'exact'
  #是否屏蔽大小写
    ignore_case: true
  #如果有下方权限可以不被屏蔽
    bypass_permission: ''
  # 如果消息包含[contains]'气息遮蔽'(区分大小写)
  - message: '气息遮蔽'
    mode: 'contains'
    ignore_case: false
    bypass_permission:
  - message: 'Weakness'
    mode: 'contains'
    ignore_case: false
    bypass_permission:
  - message: 'slow'
    mode: 'contains'
    ignore_case: true
    bypass_permission:
  - message: 'experience'
    mode: 'contains'
    ignore_case: true
    bypass_permission:
  #屏蔽信息'冷却'(不区分大小写)
  - message: '冷却'
    mode: 'contains'
    ignore_case: true
    bypass_permission: ''复制代码值得注意的是 有时要禁用消息的真正内容需要在后台找到
比如客户端显示的是[给予玩家Mr_qian_s虚弱效果*100 999999s]
但真正的消息是后台里的[Given Weakness (ID 18) * 100 to Mr_qian_s for 99999 seconds]
这是我用于自己RPG服的配置
因为用了skillapi技能作为攻击手段 普通攻击要给虚弱效果
一长串的药水给予消息特别烦人
我添加了一个message为Weakness
那么服务器在给予玩家药水效果"虚弱"时就不会在聊天框显示

Unfortunately, there's currently no easy way for me to support these newer Java versions. The Java Reflection API is heavily used in this project, and since the Java compiler has changed since Java 11, I'd have to rewrite some of this code. A change of the implementation is currently not feasible for me due to lack of time. I'm sorry
